title: Collision Course
description: Lucas had it all--popularity, a devoted girlfriend, a brotherly best friend, and a loving mother who would do anything for him. Life was right on course to be successful and fullfilling...until the crash changed everything. Late at night, during a sudden downpour, three young lives are lost and Lucas, the lone survivor, is left to face the consequences. Surrounded by swirling gossip as to what really happened that fateful eveving, Lucas now finds himself outcast. Shunned by former friends, condemned by the people of his small town, and riddled with guilt and self-hatred, he struggles to find hope, find peace, and maybe, even find love.
author: S.C. Stephens
